item.description:
April Monthly Meet Up!

MARGARITAS in Waltham
211 Moody Street, Waltham, MA
(781) 893-9990

http://www.margs.com/...

Hola amigos! (Sorry, that's it for Spanish for me) . The bar is too crowded for a group our size, so we'll get a table. You can order appetizers and drinks, get a whole meal, or split something with a friend. It's all good.

RSVPs need to be YES or NO. Last time we had to move to a larger table when MAYBE's showed up, therefore all MAYBE's shall be forced to don a sombrero and do the Mexican Hat Dance for our pleasure. OLE'

See ya there!

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Boston/Brookline/Burbs Peer-Divorce Support May Meetup
